object.name: linked_article
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="excerpt" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Detailed description or fair-use excerpt.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Excerpt</title> </field> <field name="attribution" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Attribution or copyright notice.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Attribution</title> </field> <field name="link" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Complete web address (include http:// or https://) of complete work.</description> <title>Link</title> </field> <field name="link_title" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>If field is left empty, this page's title will be used.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Link Title</title> </field> </schema> </model>
